entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 12:30 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries becoming mixed with rain showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 12:30 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023
